ValidationRule.label: Value Length

StringProperty.Description: The length compare value. Can be the number of characters in case of string elements, or the number of bytes in case of BLOB elements (e.g. 10MB, 20KB, 1024).

ValidationRule.Description:
The Value Length validation rule allows to validate the length of the element value, or the size in bytes of the selected file.
  • ${propertyValue}: the element value
  • ${propertyName}: the element name
  • ${objectName}: the parent element name
  • ${valueLength}: the submitted value length
  • ${length}: the comparison value length
